name: Music Player
description: A Telegram Music Bot written in Python using Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls

API_ID.description: Telegram API_ID, get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Telegram API_HASH, get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

SESSION.description: Pyrogram String Session, get it from https://telegram.me/AnonymousStringBot

SUDOERS.description: ID of sudo users who have special access (Separate with space if more than one)

PREFIX.description: Bot commad prefix or handler (separate multiple prefix with space)

LANGUAGE.description: An available bot language (read the README.md for more info)

CUSTOM_QUALITY.description: An available stream quality (read the README.md for more info)
